# Test: Unicode characters in summary handled correctly
gitinit
cp kamaji.yaml kamaji.yaml
exec git add .
exec git commit -m 'init'

env KAMAJI_AGENT_SCRIPT='task_complete pass "Fixed bug ğŸ› in æ—¥æœ¬èª module"'
exec kamaji start --spawner-cmd=mock-agent
stdout 'Task completed'

-- kamaji.yaml --
name: test
base_branch: main

  - name: TEST-1
    branch: feat/test-1
    tasks:
